titles.title: Community Readiness Act
Community Readiness Act

To authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services, in consultation with the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to award grants to certain entities to conduct research on, or to establish, wastewater surveillance and other early warning systems, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Community Readiness Act
This bill allows the Department of Health and Human Services to award grants for research institutions or state or local governments to research or establish wastewater surveillance systems or other early-warning systems for detecting infectious diseases.
